entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
